problem.markdown:
Write a short travel blog about a journey or a place you have visited. Think about the following questions:
1- Where were you?
2- When was it?
3- Who was there?
4- What happened? After, check how was it: (x) Mark as done. ( ) I don't know how to do. [explanation] Show your teacher next class. [explanation]
problem.p: Write a short travel blog about a journey or a place you have visited.

Think about the following questions:
1- Where were you?
2- When was it?
3- Who was there?
4- What happened?

choicegroup.choice: I don't know how to do.
